title: 2025 Philippine National Elections Guide
content:
The 2025 Democratic Exercise

As of January 2025, Filipino netizens are actively searching for:

  • Official list of presidential candidates
  • Voting precinct locations
  • Candidate platforms comparison

Key Dates

Mark your calendars for these important milestones:

EventDate
Candidate FilingMarch 1-5, 2025
Campaign PeriodApril 13-May 10, 2025
Election DayMay 12, 2025
